required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Interaction Study Between Apatinib and Rosuvastatin or Metformin in Solid Tumor Subjects.
clinical_study.official_title: Open-Label, Fixed-Sequence Study in Solid Tumor Subjects to Investigate the Pharmacokinetic Interaction Between Apatinib and Transporter Substrates Rosuvastatin and Metformin.

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of the study was to assess investigate the pharmacokinetic effects of Apatinib on Rosuvastatin or Metformin.
The secondary objective of the study was to assess the safety of Apatinib alone or Rosuvastatin/Metformin alone or concomitant medication.

primary_outcome.description: The Cmax is the maximum observed concentration

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration‐Time Curve From Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Time (AUC [0-last])
primary_outcome.description: The AUC (0‐last) is the area under the plasma concentration‐time curve from time zero to last quantifiable time.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration‐Time Curve From Time Zero to Infinite Time (AUC[0-infinity])
primary_outcome.description: The AUC (0‐infinity) is the area under the plasma concentration‐time curve from time zero to infinite time

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 35 or 37 days in two groups.
secondary_outcome.description: An adverse event is any untoward medical occurrence in a patient or clinical study participant criteria

arm_group.arm_group_label: Assess PK effects of Apatinib on Rosuvastatin
arm_group.description: Participant will be administered a single oral dose of rosuvastatin 10 milligram (mg) on Day 1 and Day 7 and Apatinib at a dose of 250 mg once daily from Day 4 until Day 9.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Assess PK effects of Apatinib on Metformin
arm_group.description: Participant will be administered a single oral dose of metformin 500 milligram (mg) on Day 1 and Day 6 and Apatinib at a dose of 250 mg once daily from Day 3 until Day 7.

intervention.description: Apatinib will be administered at a dose of 250 mg once daily from Day 4 to Day 9.
intervention.arm_group_label: Assess PK effects of Apatinib on Rosuvastatin

intervention.description: Rosuvastatin will be administered as a single oral 10 milligram (mg) dose on Day 1 and Day 7.
intervention.arm_group_label: Assess PK effects of Apatinib on Rosuvastatin

intervention.description: Apatinib will be administered at a dose of 250 mg once daily from Day 3 to Day 7.
intervention.arm_group_label: Assess PK effects of Apatinib on Metformin

intervention.description: Metformin will be administered as a single oral 500 mg on Day 1 and Day 6.
intervention.arm_group_label: Assess PK effects of Apatinib on Metformin
